body:
Day 25 - 587*
The translation was an absolute disaster and you can only masturbate to this if you turn of your brain or are a sadistic. Overall the story was pretty enjoyable but almost hard to understand because of the translation. The lore is pretty deep but some things are left unanswered. In the end, a pretty good manga, a little censorship, a protagonist that fights for animal rights and a few sessions of coke and this could become an anime.
7/10.

This is so confusing to me. Do people see these girls as dogs or as humans acting like dogs? Kinda skimmed it because fem guro and ryona ain't my thing. Also not into scat.

Now this shit is fucked up.
How far do we have to stray from our humanity to do shit like this? Like what the fuck, it's messed up.
On the topic of animals going extinct, I see it happening.
As well as the end of humans.
But yeah. If you like this shit to the point of rereading it, I'm judging hardcore dude. Like.
No.

There is one thing that worries me about this. From the looks of it all animals (as we know them) have died and beed replaced by human vershions of those animals (as shown by the bunny, sheep and cow girls) but then does that mean they kill them and eat cow, sheep and other animal girls like we do normal animals???? Tbh im prob looking into this way to much.
